00097 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00098  * Classes
00099  */
00100 
00105 class WindowsConsole_sink
00106 {
00107 public:
00114     WindowsConsole_sink(HANDLE hConsole, WORD textAttributes)
00115         : m_hConsole(hConsole)
00116         , m_textAttributes(textAttributes)
00117     {}
00119     WindowsConsole_sink(WindowsConsole_sink const& rhs);
00120 private:
00121     WindowsConsole_sink& operator =(WindowsConsole_sink const& rhs);
00122 
00123 public:
00125     WindowsConsole_sink& write(int flags, size_t cchTotal, size_t numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results)
00126     {
00127 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00128         using ::fastformat::util::concat_slices;
00129 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00130 
00131         stlsoft::auto_buffer<ff_char_t> text(cchTotal + 1u + 2u);
00132 
00133 #ifndef STLSOFT_CF_THROW_BAD_ALLOC
00134         if(text.empty())
00135         {
00136         }
00137         else
00138 #endif /* !STLSOFT_CF_THROW_BAD_ALLOC */
00139         {
00140             concat_slices(text, numResults, results);
00141 
00142             if(flags::ff_newLine & flags)
00143             {
00144                 const ff_string_slice_t crlf = fastformat_getNewlineForPlatform();
00145 
00146                 ::memcpy(&text[cchTotal], crlf.ptr, crlf.len * sizeof(ff_char_t));
00147                 cchTotal += crlf.len;
00148             }
00149 
00150             text[cchTotal] = '\0';
00151 
00152             winstl::console_colour_scope scoper(m_hConsole, m_textAttributes);
00153 
00154             WriteConsole_(m_hConsole, text.data(), cchTotal);
00155         }
00156 
00157         return *this;
00158     }
00159 
00160 private:
00161 #ifdef _WIN64
00162     static int WriteConsole_(HANDLE hConsole, ff_char_t const* message, size_t cchMessage)
00163     {
00164         return WriteConsole_(hConsole, message, stlsoft::truncation_cast<DWORD>(cchMessage));
00165     }
00166 #endif /* _WIN64 */
00167 
00168     static int WriteConsole_(HANDLE hConsole, char const* message, DWORD cchMessage)
00169     {
00170         DWORD numWritten;
00171 
00172         return ::WriteConsoleA(hConsole, message, cchMessage, &numWritten, NULL);
00173     }
00174     static int WriteConsole_(HANDLE hConsole, wchar_t const* message, DWORD cchMessage)
00175     {
00176         DWORD numWritten;
00177 
00178         return ::WriteConsoleW(hConsole, message, cchMessage, &numWritten, NULL);
00179     }
00180 
00181 private:
00182     HANDLE const    m_hConsole;
00183     WORD const      m_textAttributes;
00184 };
00185 
00186 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00187  * Creator Functions
00188  */
00189 
00194 inline WindowsConsole_sink WindowsConsole(HANDLE hConsole, WORD textAttributes)
00195 {
00196     return WindowsConsole_sink(hConsole, textAttributes);
00197 }
00198 
00203 inline WindowsConsole_sink WindowsConsole(WORD textAttributes)
00204 {
00205     return WindowsConsole_sink(::GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), textAttributes);
00206 }
00207 
00208 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00209  * Action Shims
00210  */
00211 
00218 inline WindowsConsole_sink& fmt_slices(WindowsConsole_sink& sink, int flags, size_t cchTotal, size_t numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results)
00219 {
00220     return sink.write(flags, cchTotal, numResults, results);
00221 }
